name: Morning Bliss Espresso
description: A rich and bold espresso blend with notes of dark chocolate and a smooth finish, perfect for starting your day.

name: Velvet Roast Colombian
description: Smooth and well-balanced, this Colombian coffee features a medium roast with hints of caramel and a bright acidity.

name: Dark Mountain Blend
description: A robust blend of dark-roasted beans that delivers a deep, intense flavor with earthy undertones and a lingering finish.

name: Sunrise Guatemalan
description: Bright and fruity, this Guatemalan coffee offers a delightful combination of citrus notes and a silky body, ideal for morning enjoyment.

name: Hazelnut Dream Coffee
description: A flavored coffee that combines the rich taste of roasted hazelnuts with a smooth coffee base, creating a delightful treat.

name: Caramel Macchiato Delight
description: A sweet and creamy coffee blend featuring layers of caramel and milk, perfect for those who enjoy a dessert-like coffee experience.
